findings.rationale: An indefinite term can create ongoing obligations that may be burdensome or impractical for the Receiving Party, leading to potential legal challenges or compliance issues.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Return Obligations
findings.rationale: The requirement to return all Confidential Information upon termination lacks specificity on how this will be verified or enforced, which may lead to disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
